contact.title: Contact
contact.description: Thank you for visiting my portfolio. If you have any questions, comments, or just want to say hello, feel free to reach out to me. I am always happy to hear your ideas and collaborate on interesting projects. You can contact me through the contact form or via email. I look forward to hearing from you soon!
